title: [紧急]vault插件重启后报废导致服务器无限重启
author: 贴吧1wwww88
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2020-3-22 18:43 编辑 

 日志中提到Plugin already initialized!（插件已初始化）
后面的插件提示检测不到vault导致服务器关闭
把vault换了最新版问题依旧

日志见附件
插件列表见下方
   


联系服主后得知是UltraChest插件的bug，且服主在测试后未及时删除（linux面板服），已删除该插件







latest.log


2020-3-21 16:58 上传
点击文件名下载附件




88.73 KB, 下载次数: 3

replies.author: liu1413749944
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 liu1413749944 于 2020-3-21 17:15 编辑 

[16:49:15] [Server thread/WARN]: [Essentials] Detected supported permissions plugin GroupManager without Vault installed.
[16:49:15] [Server thread/WARN]: [Essentials] Features such as chat prefixes/suffixes and group-related functionality will not work until you install Vault.
[16:49:15] [Server thread/INFO]: [Essentials] Using superperms-based permissions.
[16:49:15] [Server thread/INFO]: Done (17.558s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
[16:49:15] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server可能需要重新配置ESS插件
GroupManager without Vault installed.

replies.author: 贴吧1wwww88
replies.txt_content:
删除了UltraChest插件
系服主测试后未删除
已恢复
封帖
---------------------------
